item.title: CVE-2023-51534|2024-02-01T10:31:20.665Z -- brave -- brave%20%E2%80%93%20create%20popup%2C%20optins%2C%20lead%20generation%2C%20survey%2C%20sticky%20elements%20%26%20interactive%20content
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brave Brave – Create Popup, Optins, Lead Generation, Survey, Sticky Elements & Interactive Content allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Brave – Create Popup, Optins, Lead Generation, Survey, Sticky Elements & Interactive Content: from n/a through 0.6.2.
